name: Sadie's Tail
description:
A downloadable game for Android. 

Sadie’s Tail is an interactive mobile narrative game that follows the life of a dog. You play as Sadie the dog, making decisions about what shoe to chew and which humans to interact with. Sadie’s Tail is a story about unconditional love and learning that time doesn’t rupture all connections. 

WHO should play this game? 

People who like interactive narrative games, children from ages 7 to 14, and people who love dogs unconditionally. Our game is primarily targeted at audiences who enjoy casual social games and family-oriented narratives. 

This game was made in collaboration between students from USC Games and USC's Thornton School of Music. All code, art assets, and music are original with the exception of purchasing LeanTouch+ gesture touch assistant asset.
